oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys - XERB transcriptions - Series II, #2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings performed by Smokey Smith and the Gold Coast Boys, likely transcribed for radio station XERB (Rosarito Beach, Mexico) circa late 1940s. Labeled as series II, #2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Smokey Smith; Gold Coast Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Make Room In Your Heart For A Friend -- Rainbow At Midnight -- South -- Silver Bells
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Smokey, 1922-; Gold Coast Boys (Musical group)
